items.preText:
Interesting change. They've identified spin to be the best option and turned to Gayle.

Zakir: "Dropping the run rate from 11 to 6.5 within 10 overs can cost them the match." Not reasonable to expect them to keep going at the same rate, mate. As long as they don't lose wickets and get too complacent, they should be good.
items.text: spins away outside off, cut to point
items.shortText: Gayle to Tamim Iqbal, no run
